BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NASHOBA BROOKS SCHOOL OF CONCORD INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: NASHOBA BROOKS SCHOOL EDUCATES CHILDREN FOR A LIFE OF CONTINUOUS LEARNING, ACCOMPLISHMENT, AND LEADERSHIP IN A DIVERSE AND CHANGING WORLD. THE SCHOOL NURTURES STUDENTS' TALENTS AND CHARACTER, WHILE FOSTERING THE DEVELOPMENT OF EACH CHILD'S PERSONAL EXCELLENCE IN ACADEMICS, ATHLETICS AND THE ARTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: NASHOBA BROOKS SCHOOL EDUCATES CHILDREN FOR A LIFE OF CONTINUOUS LEARNING, ACCOMPLISHMENT, AND LEADERSHIP IN A DIVERSE AND CHANGING WORLD. THE SCHOOL NURTURES STUDENTS' TALENTS AND CHARACTER, WHILE FOSTERING THE DEVELOPMENT OF EACH CHILD'S PERSONAL EXCELLENCE IN ACADEMICS, ATHLETICS AND THE ARTS.
IRS990.Desc: THE SCHOOL EDUCATES BOYS (PRESCHOOL - GRADE 3) AND GIRLS (PRESCHOOL - GRADE 8) TO PREPARE THEM IN ALL ASPECTS OF LIFE. IN THE CLASSROOM, THE SCHOOL'S EXCEPTIONALLY TRAINED STAFF USES THE MOST UP TO DATE TEACHING METHODS AND ALL RESOURCES AVAILABLE TO STIMULATE THE CHILDREN'S MINDS AND TO HELP THEM DEVELOP THE DISCIPLINE NECESSARY TO PROGRESS IN THE REAL WORLD. THE SCHOOL ALSO PROVIDES THESE CHILDREN WITH MANY OPPORTUNITIES TO LEARN AND GROW OUTSIDE THE CLASSROOM THROUGH EXTRA-CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES; ALL IN AN ATTEMPT TO DEVELOP THESE CHILDREN INTO CONTRIBUTING MEMBERS OF THE COMMUNITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE INTENDED USES OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE TO ATTRACT, RETAIN AND DEVELOP DEDICATED FACULTY, ENHANCE THE CURRICULUM THROUGH INNOVATIVE, CHILD-CENTERED PROGRAMS IN ACADEMICS, THE ARTS AND ATHLETICS, TO KEEP TECHNOLOGY CURRENT, AND TO PROVIDE TUITION ASSISTANCE TO STUDENTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Schedule E, Line 3 - Racially Nondiscriminatory Policy Publicized
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A non-discrimination policy is published in the Boston Globe by the National Association of Independent Schools, of which the organization is a member.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Schedule E, Line 4 - Explanation of Records and Materials Not Maintained
Schedule E, Line 5 - Explanation of Organization Discrimination by Race

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE FOR TUITION AND AFTERSCHOOL PROGRAM

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Grantmaker's Description of How Grants are Used
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AMOUNT OF FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE IS MONITORED BY THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES APPROVES THE BUDGET FOR FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATIONS GOVERNING BODY HAVE BEEN PROVIDED A COPY OF THE FORM 990 AND THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE TREASURER BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS THE TRUSTEES REVIEW AND SIGN OFF ON THE POLICIES STATING THAT THEY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE WITH THE POLICIES IN PLACE AND WILL ABIDE BY THE POLICIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE SCHOOL'S COMPENSATION COMMITTEE. THIS REVIEW INCLUDES PEER SCHOOL INFORMATION COMPILED BY THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS (NAIS). IN ADDITION, A LABOR LAW ATTORNEY REVIEWS THE HEAD'S COMPENSATION PACKAGE EVERY FEW YEARS. FOR SENIOR ADMINISTRATION, THE REVIEW IS DONE BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AND DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND INCLUDES STATISTICAL INFORMATION FROM NAIS. THE DIRECTOR OF FINANCE'S COMPENSATION IS ALSO REVIEWED BY THE TREASURER OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE SCHOOL'S WEBSITE. THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
